channel.title: RSC-360 Come join us! just opend!
channel.description: Hello MoparScape users id bring good news! Come and join RSC-360! We are a new community looking for good staff Rates 85x we need more players guys so come on! http://rsc360.team-talk.net/forum.htm Come and join us! we need you! We have Great staff as i said we are looking for more just go to the website register and there you go! i will be updating this server DAILY EVERYDAY. i plan on making this server big, i know it will take some time but it will happen. so why dont you guys help me out Thanks!! -Zack [IMG]http://i822.photobucket.com/albums/zz149/xxwarrioraapxx/RCS.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i822.photobucket.com/albums/zz149/xxwarrioraapxx/ooooooo.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i822.photobucket.com/albums/zz149/xxwarrioraapxx/oooooo.jpg[/img][IMG]http://i822.photobucket.com/albums/zz149/xxwarrioraapxx/KBD.jpg[/img]

item.title: RSC-360 Come join us! just opend!
item.dc:creator: @f_2_p_2_p_f f 2 p 2 p f
item.description:
@f_2_p_2_p_f wrote:

“Hello MoparScape users id bring good news” That’s kind of a turn-off for advertisement, id bring you good news
Wouldn’t I bring you good news sound better?

Perhaps you should add new things then tell people about your server?

Read full topic

item.description:
@Krypton1 wrote:

Seems like a stupid idea for your xp rates to jump from 10x, to 70x, to 100x, who the hell would even bother playing your server during the 10x period? It would make your server only populated at certain times.

item.description:
@warrioraapxx wrote:

Hello MoparScape users id bring good news! Come and join RSC-360! We are a new community looking for good staff
Rates 85x we need more players guys so come on!

rsc360.board-directory.net

Free forum : X-Scape

Free forum : X-Scape Runescape Classic 360. RSC-360


Come and join us! we need you!
We have Great staff as i said we are looking for more just go to the website register and there you go!
i will be updating this server DAILY EVERYDAY.
i plan on making this server big, i know it will take some time but it will happen.
so why dont you guys help me out Thanks!!
-Zack
